page.title: 02Principal Features
page.content:
Battle of Newburn was fought within our square.The brickworks and the steelworks are evidence of the industrial importance of the area;as is the abundant evidence of the mining industry.The heyday of the mines has long since past but many of the older residents recall them working. The changing times is reflected in the variety of housing:ranging from the nineteenth century terraced house to modern estates built on land purchased by housing developers.The changing pattern of industry is illustrated by the occupation of a lot of the old industrial sites by new industries ,particularly new mini-factory units used by service industries.
